content: कुल्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कुल-यत्] {@--1@} Relating to a family, race, or corporation. {@--2@} Wellborn. --ल्यः A respectable man. --ल्यं {@--1@} Friendly inquiry after family affairs, (condolence, congratulation &c.) {@--2@} A bone; <ls>Mv. 2. 16.</ls> {@--3@} Flesh. {@--4@} A winnowing basket. --ल्या {@--1@} A virtuous woman. {@--2@} A small river, canal, stream; कुल्यांभोभिः पवनचपलैः शाखिनो धौतमूलाः <ls>Ś. 1. 15</ls>; कुल्येवोद्यानपादपान् <ls>R. 12. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 49</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 23.</ls> {@--3@} A dike, trench. {@--4@} A measure of grain equal to 8 droṇas.
